summary: warning: dont download if sensitive to hotness
descriptionHtml:
EDIT: created a new savegame at the beginning. plug and play!

use showracemenu in the console to have an idea about creating a hot char

note: the command showracemenu resets the makeup for eyes and lips. changing race or sex messes up stats (spreads magicka, health and stamina evenly). always create a backup

EDIT: added picture with all cosmetic attributes since patch 1.3 screws showracemenu.
http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/5435-1-1325817998.jpg


required mods:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Body Mod[/url] (vanilla edition)

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666]FemFeet[/url]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3685]CBBE- with Female feet Textures[/url] (cant remember if actually needed)

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]Better Females by Bella[/url] (makeup version 3)

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809]Coolsims Hair Pack[/url]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400]Coolsims Hair Retexture[/url]
author: pheenixxx
